name: Snooze Button
description:
Snooze Button!
You are trying to sleep, but your cat and the rest of the world keep trying to wake you up!

Navigate with WASD or Arrow Keys
Tackle distractions with Ctrl or Left Mouse Button

Sleep in bed as long as you can to gain sleepy... but if you stay in bed too long the many distractions will cause you to lose sleepy!

Made by team SleepWalkers
Kevin Bryan - Design, Programming, VFX
Tyler Baldwin - Design, Art, UI, VFX
Beatriz Benavides, Art, UI
Jason Cowdrey - Production, Design, Art, Sound
Rebecca Pierce - Art
Alex Bonesteele - Programming
Hunter Mansanas - UI, Sound, Programming, VFX
